short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun Chrome extension that lets you select an emoji and then fills the screen with it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this fun Chrome extension, you will be able to select from a menu of nine different emojis, and then have that emoji duplicate itself across your screen for about five seconds before it disappears! Presenting something in a class or in a virtual meeting? When the presentation hits a funny spot, click on the extension and select the laughing emoji to fill your screen!! Is it time for a lunch break during the presentation? Then select the pizza emoji and it will then fill the screen. The nine emojis you have to choose from are: the smile, frown, heart, clapping, laughing, confetti, pizza, surprised and poo emojis.
